name: The Walking Legs
description:
A shooting game that you getting points while killing monsters.

You are an archer in Forbidden Woods and you stuck in there. There is two type of monsters on this woods.  Red monsters are walks, green ones are runs at you. While your score getting higher, game is speeding up!

That's all about my game. Also this is a sketch game that i made while learning game development. Have fun with it!

How To Play

Up -  W  /   Down - S  /  Left - A  /  Right - D

Up Shot  -   Up Arrow   /  Down Shot  -  Down Arrow 
Left Shot  -  Left Arrow  /  Right Shot  -  Right Arrow

Esc  -   Pause
Space  -  Restart
